Title: Relates to the issuance of license plates for vehicles owned by severely disabled persons
Summary: Removes the requirement of a disability for family members for the issuance of additional disabled person plates to family members of a severely disabled person.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issuance of license plates for vehicles owned by severely disabled persons
